education_text.0: Mahadev   Satyanarayanan is an Indian experimental      Computer scientist computer scientist, an      Association for Computing Machinery ACM          and      Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers IEEE          fellow, and the Carnegie Group Professor of Computer Science at      Carnegie Mellon University Carnegie Mellon University (CMU)Mahadev   Satyanarayanan is an Indian experimental      Computer scientist computer scientist, an      Association for Computing Machinery ACM          and      Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers IEEE          fellow, and the Carnegie Group Professor of Computer Science at      Carnegie Mellon University Carnegie Mellon University (CMU)Over a year period, AFS has been a seminal influence on academic research and commercial practice in distributed data storage systems for unstructured data
